title: Provost-Marshal: a romance of the middle shires
author: Moncreiff, Frederick Charles
snippet: Now there was a certain James Lawson of Cairnmuir, who was the owner of a substantial mansionin Edinburgh, and enjoyed a somewhat unusualcredit among the citizens.

title: Provost-Marshal: a romance of the middle shires
author: Moncreiff, Frederick Charles
snippet: I cannot spare him anybody suitable forhis purpose; but ye will go with him, and when yereach Edinburgh repair to the house of James Lawsonof Cairnmuir.
